Room.Name: Jacob's Ladder
Room.Description: You are at the bottom of what seems to be an endless ladder. This large golden ladder reaches up into the clouds as far as the eye can see.

Room.Name: Jabob's Ladder
Room.Description: As you climb the ladder a cloud floats by lazily. You try not to look down for fear of falling, but do anyways. As you look down you can only see clouds and as you look upward only the ladder continuing.

Room.Name: Jacob's Ladder
Room.Description: As you continue to climb the ladder you notice something very large comming into view. You cannot quite make out what it is because the clouds cover it for the most part.

Room.Name: Before the pearly gates
Room.Description: Before you stands a massive pearly gate. Light reflects in every direction making a beautify display. You can detect the sweet smell of incense as it wafts through the air.

Room.Name: The courtyard
Room.Description: No man has beheld such a beautiful sight as this. As you enter the courtyard you notice you are standing on pure crystal. Lush greens surround you on all sides. Six golden stands burn incense constantly makeing you feel very calm. To the North a spectacular temple rises above the other buildings. To the east is a library. To the west is an academy, and behind you lies the gates.

Room.Name: The Academy
Room.Description: You are in a large war room with practice dummies and sparing weapons dispersed throughout the room. No doubt this is where the celestial beings prepare themselves to combat evil, and protect the righteous.

Room.Name: The Library
Room.Description: It is quite a bit darker in here because of the lack of windows. Torches lining the walls between the bookcases cause shadows to dance across the room. There are several tables piled high with papers and books that seem to be in no particular order.

Room.Name: Road to the Temple
Room.Description: You are walking down a road composed of solid gold bricks. As you head closer to the temple you can hear beautiful voices singing. There seems to be a aura of radiant light surrounding the whole temple. To the east there is a small shop.

Room.Name: Steps before the Temple gates
Room.Description: You are standing at the bottom of a large flight of stairs leading up to the temple gates.The gate is made completely of jasper that refracts light in every direction. There is a large key hole in the middle of the gate.

Room.Name: The Temple's Foyer
Room.Description: You are standing in a spacious room adorned with colorful tapestrys and rugs. The walls are made of gold, and the arches that lead in all directions are lined with emerald. You feel the floor undulate with waves seeming to come from the north.

Room.Name: A hallway lined with torches
Room.Description: The torches in this hall flicker, causing golden light to reflect off of the walls giving it a breathtaking appearence.

Room.Name: A hallway lined with torches
Room.Description: The torches in this hall flicker, causing golden light to reflect off of the walls giving it a breathtaking appearence.

Room.Name: A hallway lined with torches
Room.Description: The torches in this hall flicker, causing golden light to reflect off of the walls giving it a breathtaking appearence.

Room.Name: A bend in the hallway
Room.Description: The torches in this hall flicker causing golden light to reflect off of the walls giving it a breathtaking appearence.The hall makes a turn to the north.

Room.Name: A hallway lined with torches
Room.Description: The torches in this hall flicker causing golden light to reflect off of the walls giving it a breathtaking appearence.

Room.Name: A hallway lined with torches
Room.Description: The torches in this hall flicker causing golden light to reflect off of the walls giving it a breathtaking appearence.

Room.Name: A hallway lined with torches
Room.Description: The torches in this hall flicker causing golden light to reflect off of the walls giving it a breathtaking appearence. There a small rooms to the east and west.

Room.Name: A prayer room.
Room.Description: You have entered a very plain room with only a kneeling bench and a small window looking outdoors.

Room.Name: A prayer room
Room.Description: You have entered a very plain room with only a kneeling bench and a small window looking outdoors.

Room.Name: A storage room
Room.Description: A small cramped storage room filled with odds and ends. There are some shelfs against the back wall stacked with cleaning supplies. There is also a grating on the floor large enough to fit through.

Room.Name: A musty shaft
Room.Description: You are climbing down a rusty ladder toward an strange purple light below.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: You now stand at the bottom of the shaft. Before you is a purple crystaline arch radiating light and and emitting a faint humming noise.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: Before an obsidian door
Room.Description: A large obsidian door with glowing runes inscribed upon it blocks the way south.

Room.Name: The Keeper's room
Room.Description: You are in a large room that seems to have been carved out of the amethyst. There is a bookshelf against the back wall, and a cot to the the left. In the middle of the room the Keeper of the cavern sits at his desk.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: In front of a cage
Room.Description: You stand before a large iron cage. You cannot quite see into the cage but you hear a soft hissing. Perhaps you should go back the way you came.

Room.Name: The Serpent's cage
Room.Description: There are bones scatered about in the cage. You feel very uneasy. Just as you are about to leave. HSssssss!

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: The Amethyst cavern
Room.Description: The walls of this cavern are encrusted with gorgeous purple gems. All around you the cavern glows and hums softly. The cavern winds off in several directions.

Room.Name: Before the Great Portal
Room.Description: You have come to a dead end in the cavern. Before you lies a great amethyst portal. The humming is much stronger here, and the walls are quite a bit brighter.

Room.Name: A dragon's lair
Room.Description: You have entered the lair of the Amethyst Dragon. You cannot even see the floor through the mounds of human bones lying everywhere. The humming in this room seems ro resonate in your skull, and the light is so bright you have to shield your eyes.

Room.Name: A slender hallway
Room.Description: This hallway is quite a bit smaller than the others, its floors are a beautiful black marble, and all along the hallway there are beautiful stained glass windows depicting different scenes.

Room.Name: A slender hallway
Room.Description: This hallway is quite a bit smaller than the others, its floors are a beautiful black marble, and all along the hallway there are beautiful stained glass windows depicting different scenes.

Room.Name: A slender hallway
Room.Description: This hallway is quite a bit smaller than the others, its floors are a beautiful black marble, and all along the hallway there are beautiful stained glass windows depicting different scenes.

Room.Name: A slender hallway
Room.Description: This hallway is quite a bit smaller than the others, its floors are a beautiful black marble, and all along the hallway there are beautiful stained glass windows depicting different scenes.

Room.Name: A slender hallway
Room.Description: This hallway is quite a bit smaller than the others, its floors are a beautiful black marble, and all along the hallway there are beautiful stained glass windows depicting different scenes.

Room.Name: Before the chapel doors
Room.Description: You have reached the end of the hallway and a large oaken door stands before you. It seems to have a strange language carved upon it. Two potted plants sit ornamently on either side of the door.

Room.Name: An extremely large chapel
Room.Description: The chapel's ceiling towers at least 30 feet above you. There are beautiful white marble pillars, golden pews, and gorgeous stained glass windows here. To the front of the chapel there is an ornate pulpit inlaid with precious stones. The door to the priests vestibule is behind the pulpit.

Room.Name: The priest's vestibule
Room.Description: This is a small quiet room with nothing but a small chair, and a desk. This is where the priest prepares himself before he enters the chapel.

Room.Name: A grand stairwell
Room.Description: A beautiful spiral staircase made of gold leads to the temples second level.

Room.Name: The second floor of the temple
Room.Description: Halls head in every direction from this point. This seems to be a floor totally dedicated to the higher powers of goodness. You can see each hallway is heavely guarded, especially to the north.

Room.Name: The western hall
Room.Description: This hall is lined on both sides with golden statues of angels with thier wings arched over forming a kind of canopy. The floor is covered by a long rug embroidered with cherubs.

Room.Name: The western hall
Room.Description: This hall is lined on both sides with golden statues of angels with thier wings arched over forming a kind of canopy. The floor is covered by a long rug embroidered with cherubs.

Room.Name: The western hall
Room.Description: This hall is lined on both sides with golden statues of angels with thier wings arched over forming a kind of canopy. The floor is covered by a long rug embroidered with cherubs.

Room.Name: The end of the hall
Room.Description: A large golden door dominates the western wall, and radiant light pours out from under the door. You suddenly develop a righteous fear and doubt your purity.

Room.Name: Michael's chamber
Room.Description: As you step into this room you realize there are no walls, no floor, and no ceiling. You are suspended in a pure white light that seems to radiate from a being with the apearing to be comprized of energy crckleing about the air.

Room.Name: The eastern hall
Room.Description: This hall is lined on both sides with golden statues of angels with thier wings arched over forming a kind of canopy. The floor is covered by a long rug embroidered with cherubs.

Room.Name: The eastern hall
Room.Description: This hall is lined on both sides with golden statues of angels with thier wings arched over forming a kind of canopy. The floor is covered by a long rug embroidered with cherubs.

Room.Name: The eastern hall
Room.Description: This hall is lined on both sides with golden statues of angels with thier wings arched over forming a kind of canopy. The floor is covered by a long rug embroidered with cherubs.

Room.Name: The end of the hall
Room.Description: A large emerald door dominates the eastern wall, and radiant light pours out from under the door.You suddenly develop a righteous fear and doubt your purity.

Room.Name: Gabriel's chammber
Room.Description: As you step into this room you realize there are no walls, no floor, and no ceiling. You are suspended in a pure white light that seems to radiat from a being with the appearance of lightning.

Room.Name: The southern hall
Room.Description: This hall is lined on both sides with golden statues of angels with thier wings arched over forming a kind of canopy. The floor is covered by a long rug embroidered with cherubs.

Room.Name: The southern hall
Room.Description: This hall is lined on both sides with golden statues of angels with thier wings arched over forming a kind of canopy. The floor is covered by a long rug embroidered with cherubs.

Room.Name: The southern hall
Room.Description: This hall is lined on both sides with golden statues of angels with thier wings arched over forming a kind of canopy. The floor is covered by a long rug embroidered with cherubs.

Room.Name: The end of the hall
Room.Description: A large ruby door dominates the southern wall, and radiant light pours out from under the door.You suddenly develop a righteous fear and doubt your purity.

Room.Name: A holy spirit's chamber
Room.Description: This room seems to be formed like a square. The air shimmers, and seems to wave back and forth. In the exact center of the room there is a strange white vapor.

Room.Name: The northern hall
Room.Description: This hall is lined on both sides with golden statues of angels with thier wings arched over forming a kind of canopy. The floor is covered by a long rug embroidered with cherubs.

Room.Name: The northern hall
Room.Description: This hall is lined on both sides with golden statues of angels with thier wings arched over forming a kind of canopy. The floor is covered by a long rug embroidered with cherubs.

Room.Name: The northern hall
Room.Description: This hall is lined on both sides with golden statues of angels with thier wings arched over forming a kind of canopy. The floor is covered by a long rug embroidered with cherubs.

Room.Name: A door of pure energy
Room.Description: Here stands a barrier of pure light. It shines a pure white light that seems to pass right through you. A feeling of eminant judgement permiates you. A plaque on the door says "Only those of the purest heart can escape the wrath".

Room.Name: The Judgement seat
Room.Description: A giant throne is seated directly in front of you. You seem to be on some sort of endless plane. As far as the eye can see there is a crystal sea. On the throne is seated the incarnate of good. He has the appearance of jasper and shines brighter than the sun. Peals of thunder roll out from the throne and you are frozen in terror.

Room.Name: The Herbary
Room.Description: You are in a small shack type building with a ceiling made of glass. There are a few cross beams over head that have many different kinds of herbs hung upside down. Your skin seems to tingle from all the smells in this shop.

Room.Name: Within a blood soaked boat house
Room.Description: This destroyed boat house is still covered in wet, warm blood. It is almost as if the annihilation of the elven people in the city had onlyjust occurred in the last few hours, rather than centuries ago. The scent of warm salty blood still hangs in the air, and the waters outside lap up into the shack carrying more bloody red waters. The only exit is back to the south onto the ruined docks of the harbour.

NPC.name: angel
NPC.description: An angel in flowing robes as white as snow glares at you sternly.
NPC.longDescription: An angel bathed in a holy aura stands here.

NPC.name: man warmaster
NPC.description: The WarMaster glares at you with an air of superiority.
NPC.longDescription: Clad in shining armor, the warmaster grits his teeth and flares his nostrils.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior AreaAttack AssistAlign

NPC.name: student warrior
NPC.description: This young warrior snarls and tries to look mean.
NPC.longDescription: A somewhat clumsy being practices here.

NPC.name: librarian woman
NPC.description: The old ladies eyes seem to make your blood freeze.
NPC.longDescription: An old shriveled librarian sits here, looking around suspisiously.

NPC.name: wisp
NPC.description: The wisp seems to crackle softly.
NPC.longDescription: A glowing ball of light hovers here.

NPC.name: keeper man
NPC.description: He glares at you and screams challenges.
NPC.longDescription: The guardian of the great amethyst cavern is here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: serpent ancient
NPC.longDescription: A giant snake with purpe scales is coiled here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Thief AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil Hide DetectIllusion

NPC.name: dragon amethyst
NPC.description: The dragons eyes flare a brilliant red.
NPC.longDescription: The mightiest of the dragons crouches here, with smoke flowing from his nostrils.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil Hide DetectIllusion Infrared Flying

NPC.name: priest man
NPC.description: The priest smiles at you warmly.
NPC.longDescription: A priest clothed in the traditional garb of the priesthood.

NPC.name: woman mourning
NPC.description: She looks at you with despair in her eyes.
NPC.longDescription: A hunched over woman kneels here, sobbing quietly to herself.

NPC.name: archangel michael
NPC.longDescription: The great archangel Michael hovers here bathed in light.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood DetectIllusion

NPC.name: archangel gabriel
NPC.longDescription: The might Gabriel hovers here borne in a bright light.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood DetectIllusion

NPC.name: spirit holy vapor
NPC.longDescription: A bright vaport floats in the center of the room.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying Swim DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: holiness holy incarnate
NPC.description: The entity seems to pass through you.
NPC.longDescription: An overwhelming sence of holiness seems to be concentrated in this room.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood Flying DetectIllusion

NPC.name: man herbalist
NPC.longDescription: A man in a muddy apron wanders around the shop doing different things.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Cleric AreaAttack Shopkeeper
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil PassDoor DetectIllusion

Item.Name: broadsword gleaming
Item.LongDescription: A beautiful sword of polished titanium rests here.

Item.Name: halo
Item.LongDescription: A circlet of pure energy hovers above the ground.

Item.Name: maul mace warmaster
Item.LongDescription: A maul covered with runes and shines brightly.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Magic NoDrop AntiEvil NoRemove BurnProof Unholy

Item.Name: plate warmaster
Item.LongDescription: A beautiful black plate that reflects a metallic purple when held up to the light.

Item.Name: ruler sharp librarian
Item.LongDescription: A sharp metal ruler with serrated edges.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Evil Magic Flaming Frost Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

Item.Name: shawl wool
Item.LongDescription: A woven shawl of grey wool.

Item.Name: shield light
Item.LongDescription: A shield rests here that seems to be made purely of light.

Item.Name: key large
Item.LongDescription: A large golden key with a red ribbon on the end, rests here.

Item.Name: sofa
Item.LongDescription: An ornate purple velvet couch with golden tassels is in the middle of the room.

Item.Name: gloves keeper
Item.LongDescription: Some amethyst encrusted gloves rest here.

Item.Name: whip keeper
Item.LongDescription: A whip glowing with power lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Magic BurnProof Flaming Frost Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

Item.Name: fang ancient
Item.LongDescription: A large and very sharp fang is sticking out of the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Magic AntiGood BurnProof Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: hide amethyst dragon
Item.ShortDescription: the hide of the Amethyst Dragon
Item.LongDescription: A shimmering hide of amethyst rests here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Invisibility Magic NoDrop NoRemove BurnProof

Item.Name: crusifix cross
Item.LongDescription: A stout wooden crusifix hums here.

Item.Name: beads rosary
Item.LongDescription: Some wooden rosary beads you believe belong to the mourning woman lie here.

Item.Name: belt white leather
Item.LongDescription: A strong belt made of white leather hums with power.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A key fashoned with gold is here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A key carved from emerald is here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A key carved from ruby rests here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A key carved from diamond hums here.

Item.Name: pure wrath sword
Item.LongDescription: Holy wrath has been forged into a weapon!
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Invisibility Magic NoDrop AntiEvil NoRemove BurnProof Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison Unholy

Item.Name: bracelet band light
Item.LongDescription: A sheild rests here that seems to be made purely of light.

Item.Name: dummy
Item.LongDescription: This dummy made from wood, hase been carved to look like some kind of a demon.

Item.Name: fountain drink fount
Item.LongDescription: This beautiful fountain brings forth crystal clear water.

Item.Name: ancient scales
Item.LongDescription: A pile of purple serpent scales lies here.

Item.Name: bracer ancient scale
Item.LongDescription: An ancient bracer from the serpent lies here.
